title: I see the changes now
description: With the latest version of the XCWalker Intranet Prototype, I've added a section dedicated to showing the latest changes noted on the GitHub

title: What is a mouse?
description: With the latest version of the XCWalker Intranet Prototype, I've now added an ability to add 'Tag:(Catagory)' to your search and limit them without hitting the dedicated buttons (Secret features to follow?)

title: Search Is Here, and It's getting better
description: With the latest version of the XCWalker Intranet Prototype, I've now added a semi-functional search (it currently only searches the tasks).

title: There can only be one
description: With the latest version of the XCWalker Intranet Prototype, I've added the ability to limit the results with the catagories

title: I'm gunna catagorise my life
description: With the latest version of the XCWalker Intranet Prototype, I've updated the search menu with sections for each catagory of search material.

title: I hope my Nan isn't navigating
description: With the latest version of the XCWalker Intranet Prototype, I've added a basic Navigation menu (These take you to the homepage sections).

title: I speak freely
description: With the latest version of the XCWalker Intranet Prototype, I've designed a basic UI for a messenger.

title: Somewhere for my feet
description: With the latest version of the XCWalker Intranet Prototype, I've added a basic footer concept (Not sure what to put in it).

title: A search to come
description: With the latest version of the XCWalker Intranet Prototype, I've designed the first iteration of the search system.

title: Time together
description: With the latest version of the XCWalker Intranet Prototype, I've designed a basic calendar UI (Suggestion Welcome).

title: Getting stuff done
description: With the latest version of the XCWalker Intranet Prototype, I've designed the task UI.

title: Time to surf the tube
description: With the latest version of the XCWalker Intranet Prototype, I've designed the UI for the YouTube intergration (Too be added at a later date).

title: A design I see
description: With the latest version of the XCWalker Intranet Prototype, I've designed the initail for the Intranet.
